title: Rangers condemn ‘shameful’ attack on Smith statue; fans respond to Tuchel criticism: football – live
summary: A rolling report offers live updates and reactions from the England vs. Wales match, alongside news related to World Cup qualifying. Writers will provide insights on the game and other relevant developments. Stay tuned for ongoing coverage and highlights from this crucial sporting event.

title: White House slams Trump’s perceived Nobel peace prize snub as ‘politics over peace’
summary: The spokesperson emphasized the president's humanitarian values following a failed attempt to secure a prize related to a Gaza ceasefire deal. The remarks highlight the president's commitment to humanitarian issues despite the setback. The situation underscores ongoing challenges in achieving peace in the region.

title: Pound on track for worst week since January as UK wage growth falls to four-year low – business live
summary: Economic and financial news coverage continues to evolve with real-time updates on market trends, policy changes, and significant economic events. Analysts are closely monitoring indicators such as inflation rates, stock market performance, and central bank decisions. Investors are advised to stay informed to navigate potential market fluctuations effectively.

title: Letitia James accuses Donald Trump of ‘weaponizing’ US justice system after her indictment – US politics live
summary: The prosecutor who spearheaded the civil fraud investigation against Donald Trump in 2023 has described the charges brought against her as unfounded. She maintains that the allegations lack merit and are an attempt to undermine her work. The situation highlights ongoing tensions surrounding the legal cases involving Trump.

title: Spitting Image comics decry lawsuit over depiction of Paddington Bear
summary: Comedians Al Murray and Matt Forde are defending their artistic freedom after facing backlash for their portrayal of a foul-mouthed drug addict. They argue that the criticism amounts to an attack on freedom of expression. The duo emphasizes the importance of creative expression, even when it challenges societal norms.
